name: Weekly Spread Podcast
subtitle: WSP
author: The Modern
description: This Podcast is short and sweet. We give you 3 spreads a week during the NFL season! We pick em' you stick with them!

name: Fargo Watch Party
subtitle: A recap of every episode of the award-winning show.
author: JD Ferrell & Stephen Meriwether
description: Stephen and JD recap every episode of Fargo, the award-winning FX & Hulu series. We react to major events, debate the rules of the "hitman code", and make predictions about the next episodes. Join us as we experience the wild ride that is Fargo.

name: A Modern Woman Podcast
subtitle: A Podcast About Modern Women
author: Breeana Danell
description: Join Bree and Dugheiny as they walk you through being A Modern Woman. Whether it's dating, friendship, or everyday life.
